  • java.lang.Object

    LimitDAO

    public class DBLimitDAO
extends Object
implements LimitDAO
    Implementation of LimitDAO for standard SQL databases

        public boolean exist(String hostid)
              throws DAOException
        Description copied from interface: LimitDAO
        Verify if a Limit object with the specified hostid exists in the persistance layer
        Specified by:
        exist in interface LimitDAO
        Parameters:
        hostid - Hostid of the Limit object verified
        Returns:
